This shirt is super cute, and fits well. I am 5’8” and 205 lbs and normally float between a large and XL, I sized up to a 2X in this shirt based on the size chart and it fits perfectly.  That being said, the vinyl picture cracked after just the first washing. Doesn’t give me much hope as to how many more washes it will last. On the positive side though, the colors didn’t bleed in the wash. Washed in cold water and how heat in the dryer. So maybe line dry would be best. There are zero washing instructions on the shirt, so who knows.  I would not buy from this company again.

评论概述: Poly-cotton blend. Big rubbery print/appliqué heart
评论详情: At the time of my order and as I’m writing this review, the description lists the fabric content of this long sleeved tee as 100% cotton. That is not correct. I ordered color option Red-b and this shirt is made of poly-cotton blend. The tag shows the content as 65% cotton 35% polyester. The fabric is lightweight, soft, and stretchy. The heart is larger than it appears in the picture in the listing. Also, it is not a regular print or a fabric appliqué as I assumed from the looks in the picture. Instead, it is the rubbery type of appliqué print and it isn’t very well done either. The fit is true to size. I’m 5’7” 150 lbs 36DDD and I wear size large tops. This size large fits me well. Overall, this shirt is not what I expected in terms of the fabric and I really don’t care for the big rubbery heart on the front, but it fits well and it is comfortable to wear, so it will make a good home wear shirt.
Loved the shirt and I received  many compliments however it was not long enough to wear with leggings.
